description: UN Joint Programme on Water and Sanitation in Mongolia

subproject.description:
Output 1. Institutional structure and legal framework of water governance and sanitation will be strengthened.
Output 2.  Awareness, knowledge, skills and practice of professionals, communities and schoolchildren will be improved on water, sanitation and hygiene.
Output 3.  Increased laboratory capacity on drinking and wastewater testing will be promoted, especially in rural areas.
Output 4.  The number of improved drinking water sources and sanitation facilities will be increased in the target communities, schools and hospitals.
Output 5. Community-based management of water sources will be enhanced in a sustainable manner.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Water and Sanitation Joint Pro
